snippet.title: Aksun 0.73 Alpha Full Gameplay (Kor) - No Commentary
snippet.description:
We have changed the title from "Dred's Crossing" to "Aksun"
Aksun 0.73 Alpha Full Gameplay (Kor) - No Commentary

Link
- Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3129360/
- Website: https://www.waywaystudio.com/works/aksun
- Twitter(X): https://x.com/waywaystudio

Features
In Aksun, you assume the role of protagonist Dred.
After his death, his soul embarks on a dangerous journey to the afterlife to fulfill his task.
EXPERIENCE FIERY BATTLES IN AFTERLIFE
Dangerous combat lurks around every corner.
Make the best out of your choice of instrument so that he can move onward.
FEEL THE IMMERSIVE WORLD OF KOREAN SHAMANISM
The essence of Aksun is born from Korean folklore.
Dred encounters many figures and creatures derived from ancient history and cultural heritage.
DESIGNED FOR REPLAYABILITY
In the afterlife, death is only a minor setback.
If he collapses in combat, empower him with the spoils of war, and play the nemesis.
